X.ii.6.A.1.d
.
Making a Finding of Incompetency
A finding of incompetency cannot be made without a definite expression by a responsible medical authority unless the medical evidence of record is
clear
convincing, and
leaves no doubt as to the beneficiary’s incompetency.
Note
:
If competency of a VA beneficiary is raised without relevant medical evidence or statement from a responsible medical authority, development must be undertaken for medical evidence before the case can be forwarded to the rating activity.
References
:  For more information on
medical authority in a finding of competency, see
38 CFR 3.353(c)
, and
end products (EP), see
M21-4, Appendix B
.
